entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Antigonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 11:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: NNE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
